title: When does the Season End?
body:
I was told the season ends at :      Season 8	 - Started on January 16 2018   - 	Ends on November 10 2018

But when do you get your border?

replies.body: Usually a couple weeks after. There'll be more details closer to season end, they always put up an info page RE season end, rankings, rewards etc.
they literally already told us when the season is ending 2 months ago "emissary"
They haven't put the info page up yet. The page that details rewards etc. Like this one: https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends-november-7
